thread.title: Uefa Champions League: Ghana defender Nana Akwasi Asare tastes defeat at Valencia with Gent
thread.title_full: Uefa Champions League: Ghana defender Nana Akwasi Asare tastes defeat at Valencia with Gent

title: Uefa Champions League: Ghana defender Nana Akwasi Asare tastes defeat at Valencia with Gent
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 06:55 CET Uefa Champions League: Ghana defender Nana Akwasi Asare tastes defeat at Valencia with Gent - www.ghanasoccernet.com Nana Asare in action against Olympique Lyon, excelled against Valencia 
Ghana international defender Nana Akwasi Asare played the entire regulation minutes of the game for KAA Gent in their 2-1 loss at Valencia in the Uefa Champions League on Tuesday night. 
The 29-year-old, spotting the number 21 jersey made his third appearances in the group stages for the Belgian Pro League side who are still without a win from their opening games and lie in third place in Group H. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
